documentation.text:
@notice Array with 37 items, that represents the numbers in European roulette (0-36).
 @dev Used as a helper to determine whether the generated random number is red or black
@dev ID for the VRF keypair that the Chainlink Oracle commits to. This is provided from Chainlink

@dev Every time random number is generated the contract must pay fee for the service in LINK
 @dev Minimum LINK price for VRF service
@notice Ammount of ETH held by the Casino
@notice Ammount of ETH each gambler has in the Casino
@dev Every time random number is requested, requestId is generated by the Chainlink Oracle and is mapped with the Bet details

@dev Chainlink VRF Coordinator address: 0xdD3782915140c8f3b190B5D67eAc6dc5760C46E9
 @dev LINK token address:  0xa36085F69e2889c224210F603D836748e7dC0088

@notice Gambler withdraws funds from his balance in the Casino to his MetaMask wallet
 @dev Reentrancy Guard is added to this function using Openzeppelin ReentrancyGuard.sol

devdoc.author: Dimitar Bochvarovski
devdoc.details: Random number is generated using the Chainlink VRF

BetFinished(bytes32,uint256).details: Every time a bet is placed, a callback function fulfillRandomness which generates a rundom number is called, we are using this event to notify the frontend that the number has been generated

params.result: Number on the Roulette, randomly generated number

constructor.details: Chainlink VRF Coordinator address: 0xdD3782915140c8f3b190B5D67eAc6dc5760C46E9LINK token address:  0xa36085F69e2889c224210F603D836748e7dC0088

params.gambler: MetaMask wallet address of the gambler

returns._0: Ammount of ETH that the gambler has in the Casino (in wei)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

placeBetOnColor(uint8,uint256).details: Requests randomness from the Chainlink Oracle

params.betAmount: Amount of ETH that the gambler has used for the bet (in wei)
params.betColor: Number of color that the gembler has bet on (black or white)

returns.requestId: which is used in the fulfillRandomness callback functions

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

topUpCasinoReserve().details: Only the owner of the contract can deposit funds

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawFunds(uint256).details: Reentrancy Guard is added to this function using Openzeppelin ReentrancyGuard.sol

fee.details: Every time random number is generated the contract must pay fee for the service in LINKMinimum LINK price for VRF service

gameRounds.details: Every time random number is requested, requestId is generated by the Chainlink Oracle and is mapped with the Bet details

isNumberRed.details: Used as a helper to determine whether the generated random number is red or black

keyHash.details: ID for the VRF keypair that the Chainlink Oracle commits to. This is provided from Chainlink

devdoc.title: Roulette Simulator

casinoFunds(address).notice: Ammount of ETH each gambler has in the Casino
